memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid) noexcept
memberdef.name: ClearInventoryChanges

briefdescription.para: Clear the last recorded inventory changes for a player.

detaileddescription.para: This is used to initialize the sending of new PlayerInventory packets.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID whose inventory changes should be used.

memberdef.argsstring: () noexcept
memberdef.name: GetEquipmentSize

briefdescription.para: Get the number of slots used for equipment.

detaileddescription.para: The number is 19 before any dehardcoding is done in OpenMW.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetEquipmentChangesSize

briefdescription.para: Get the number of indexes in a player's latest equipment changes.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID whose equipment changes should be used.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetInventoryChangesSize

briefdescription.para: Get the number of indexes in a player's latest inventory changes.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID whose inventory changes should be used.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetInventoryChangesAction

briefdescription.para: Get the action type used in a player's latest inventory changes.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID whose inventory changes should be used.

simplesect.para: The action type (0 for SET, 1 for ADD, 2 for REMOVE).

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned char action) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetInventoryChangesAction

briefdescription.para: Set the action type in a player's inventory changes.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID whose inventory changes should be used.
The action (0 for SET, 1 for ADD, 2 for REMOVE).

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned short slot, const char *refId, unsigned int count, int charge, double enchantmentCharge=-1) noexcept
memberdef.name: EquipItem

briefdescription.para: Equip an item in a certain slot of the equipment of a player.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID.
The equipment slot.
The refId of the item.
The count of the item.
The charge of the item.
The enchantment charge of the item.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned short slot) noexcept
memberdef.name: UnequipItem

briefdescription.para: Unequip the item in a certain slot of the equipment of a player.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID.
The equipment slot.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, const char *refId, unsigned int count, int charge, double enchantmentCharge, const char *soul) noexcept
memberdef.name: AddItemChange

briefdescription.para: Add an item change to a player's inventory changes.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID.
The refId of the item.
The count of the item.
The charge of the item.
The enchantment charge of the item.
The soul of the item.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, const char *refId)
memberdef.name: HasItemEquipped

briefdescription.para: Check whether a player has equipped an item with a certain refId in any slot.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID.
The refId of the item.

simplesect.para: Whether the player has the item equipped.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned int changeIndex) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetEquipmentChangesSlot

briefdescription.para: Get the slot used for the equipment item at a specific index in the most recent equipment changes.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID.
The index of the equipment change.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned short slot) noexcept

briefdescription.para: Get the refId of the item in a certain slot of the equipment of a player.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID.
The slot of the equipment item.

briefdescription.para: Get the count of the item in a certain slot of the equipment of a player.

The slot of the equipment item.

The slot of the equipment item.

The slot of the equipment item.

The index of the inventory item.

memberdef.name: SendEquipment

briefdescription.para: Send a PlayerEquipment packet with a player's equipment.

detaileddescription.para: It is always sent to all players.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID whose equipment should be sent.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, bool sendToOtherPlayers, bool skipAttachedPlayer) noexcept
memberdef.name: SendInventoryChanges

briefdescription.para: Send a PlayerInventory packet with a player's recorded inventory changes.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID whose inventory changes should be used.
Whether this packet should be sent to players other than the player attached to the packet (false by default).
Whether the packet should skip being sent to the player attached to the packet (false by default).

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid) noexcept
memberdef.name: SendItemUse

briefdescription.para: Send a PlayerItemUse causing a player to use their recorded usedItem.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID affected.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid) noexcept
